actions.name: AcceptQualificationRequest
actions.description: The AcceptQualificationRequest operation grants a Worker's request for a Qualification

actions.name: ApproveAssignment
actions.description: The ApproveAssignment operation approves the results of a completed assignment

actions.name: AssociateQualificationWithWorker
actions.description: The AssociateQualificationWithWorker operation gives a Worker a Qualification

actions.name: CreateAdditionalAssignmentsForHIT
actions.description: The CreateAdditionalAssignmentsForHIT operation increases the maximum number of assignments of an existing HIT

actions.name: CreateHIT
actions.description: The CreateHIT operation creates a new HIT (Human Intelligence Task)

actions.name: CreateHITType
actions.description: The CreateHITType operation creates a new HIT type

actions.name: CreateHITWithHITType
actions.description: The CreateHITWithHITType operation creates a new Human Intelligence Task (HIT) using an existing HITTypeID generated by the CreateHITType operation

actions.name: CreateQualificationType
actions.description: The CreateQualificationType operation creates a new Qualification type, which is represented by a QualificationType data structure

actions.name: CreateWorkerBlock
actions.description: The CreateWorkerBlock operation allows you to prevent a Worker from working on your HITs

actions.name: DeleteHIT
actions.description: The DeleteHIT operation disposes of a HIT that is no longer needed

actions.name: DeleteQualificationType
actions.description: The DeleteQualificationType disposes a Qualification type and disposes any HIT types that are associated with the Qualification type

actions.name: DeleteWorkerBlock
actions.description: The DeleteWorkerBlock operation allows you to reinstate a blocked Worker to work on your HITs

actions.name: DisassociateQualificationFromWorker
actions.description: The DisassociateQualificationFromWorker revokes a previously granted Qualification from a user

actions.name: GetAccountBalance
actions.description: The GetAccountBalance operation retrieves the amount of money in your Amazon Mechanical Turk account

actions.name: GetAssignment
actions.description: The GetAssignment retrieves an assignment with an AssignmentStatus value of Submitted, Approved, or Rejected, using the assignment's ID

actions.name: GetFileUploadURL
actions.description: The GetFileUploadURL operation generates and returns a temporary URL

actions.name: GetHIT
actions.description: The GetHIT operation retrieves the details of the specified HIT

actions.name: GetQualificationScore
actions.description: The GetQualificationScore operation returns the value of a Worker's Qualification for a given Qualification type

actions.name: GetQualificationType
actions.description: The GetQualificationType operation retrieves information about a Qualification type using its ID

actions.name: ListAssignmentsForHIT
actions.description: The ListAssignmentsForHIT operation retrieves completed assignments for a HIT

actions.name: ListBonusPayments
actions.description: The ListBonusPayments operation retrieves the amounts of bonuses you have paid to Workers for a given HIT or assignment

actions.name: ListHITs
actions.description: The ListHITs operation returns all of a Requester's HITs

actions.name: ListHITsForQualificationType
actions.description: The ListHITsForQualificationType operation returns the HITs that use the given QualififcationType for a QualificationRequirement

actions.name: ListQualificationRequests
actions.description: The ListQualificationRequests operation retrieves requests for Qualifications of a particular Qualification type

actions.name: ListQualificationTypes
actions.description: The ListQualificationTypes operation searches for Qualification types using the specified search query, and returns a list of Qualification types

actions.name: ListReviewPolicyResultsForHIT
actions.description: The ListReviewPolicyResultsForHIT operation retrieves the computed results and the actions taken in the course of executing your Review Policies during a CreateHIT operation

actions.name: ListReviewableHITs
actions.description: The ListReviewableHITs operation returns all of a Requester's HITs that have not been approved or rejected

actions.name: ListWorkerBlocks
actions.description: The ListWorkersBlocks operation retrieves a list of Workers who are blocked from working on your HITs

actions.name: ListWorkersWithQualificationType
actions.description: The ListWorkersWithQualificationType operation returns all of the Workers with a given Qualification type

actions.name: NotifyWorkers
actions.description: The NotifyWorkers operation sends an email to one or more Workers that you specify with the Worker ID

actions.name: RejectAssignment
actions.description: The RejectAssignment operation rejects the results of a completed assignment

actions.name: RejectQualificationRequest
actions.description: The RejectQualificationRequest operation rejects a user's request for a Qualification

actions.name: SendBonus
actions.description: The SendBonus operation issues a payment of money from your account to a Worker

actions.name: SendTestEventNotification
actions.description: The SendTestEventNotification operation causes Amazon Mechanical Turk to send a notification message as if a HIT event occurred, according to the provided notification specification

actions.name: UpdateExpirationForHIT
actions.description: The UpdateExpirationForHIT operation allows you extend the expiration time of a HIT beyond is current expiration or expire a HIT immediately

actions.name: UpdateHITReviewStatus
actions.description: The UpdateHITReviewStatus operation toggles the status of a HIT

actions.name: UpdateHITTypeOfHIT
actions.description: The UpdateHITTypeOfHIT operation allows you to change the HITType properties of a HIT

actions.name: UpdateNotificationSettings
actions.description: The UpdateNotificationSettings operation creates, updates, disables or re-enables notifications for a HIT type

actions.name: UpdateQualificationType
actions.description: The UpdateQualificationType operation modifies the attributes of an existing Qualification type, which is represented by a QualificationType data structure
